Posts.Content: Thanks for the idea. I'll check around. Christine
Posts.Signature: Both squamous and adenocarcinoma in right center lobe, diagnosed 11/08/12. Radiation, Taxol & Carbo for 8 weeks. New tumor found 02/18/13 in upper right lung and 3 in liver. Began Abraxane & Carbo. PET showed 5 tumors in liver and spread to hip bone 04/30/13. Began Taxotere and palliative radiation for hip. Will soon begin Tarceva.
Posts.Title: Edema in armpit

Posts.Content: I actually have lung cancer, so I never posted on this part of the forum before now. But, here's my problem. I had metastasized lymph nodes removed from my left armpit area. Now, I get edema there. I wear a sports bra for extra pressure on that side. I have an elastic sleeve I wear when flying or when my arm starts to swell. But I need some pressure for the armpit itself. Does anyone know where I can buy a T-shirt style bra? Christine
